name: Pocket Threads (2021)
description:
Pocket Threads is a turn-based 2D RPG where you capture and battle monsters in a unique world composed of handmade embroidery as a person with a plant pot for a head.  Take up the mantle of Threadmaster and explore the small island, chatting with citizens that might help you on your journey. Tame up to 10 different monsters and take up to 4 with you at a time.

Play the first game to ever be made with real embroidery!

Font "Kite One" by Eduardo Tunni.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Controls 

E - Interact

Escape - Pause menu

WASD or arrow keys- Move

Scroll Wheel - Zoom camera

Combat - Your Turn

WASD or arrow keys -  Move camera

Combat- Your Monster's Turn

WASD or arrow keys -  Move OR attack in that direction

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Known Issues

Monster Storage system cannot display over 25 monsters in storage. 
Doing actions quickly in combat can cause text to be garbled (no impact on gameplay).
Your monsters like to bunch up sometimes.
Some monsters like to run away from you in combat, in fear of your combat prowess.
